title: User journey reporting event

xdm:timestamp.title: Timestamp for reporting event
xdm:timestamp.description: Time of generation of reporting event

xdm:dataEnrichmentSource.title: Data Source
xdm:dataEnrichmentSource.description: Data source used for data enrichment

xdm:dataEntityUID.title: Unique identifier of data entity
xdm:dataEntityUID.description: The identifier for the data entity used for data enrichment

xdm:orgID.title: Organizational unit identifier
xdm:orgID.description: Identifier of the organizational unit for this journey version

xdm:flowControlType.title: Flow control
xdm:flowControlType.description: Flow control in the journey triggered by the event.

meta:enum.End: if the 'end' step has been reached, if this step exists
meta:enum.Jump: if a jump has been taken
meta:enum.Timer: if a transition has been applied, implying a scheduler notification
meta:enum.Condition: if a conditional step has been processed

xdm:eventMetrics.title: Metrics to be reported
xdm:eventMetrics.description: The metrics for actions performed during this observation.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Action on step transition
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Action taken during a step transition happening for an user in state machine

xdm:actionUID.title: Action identifier
xdm:actionUID.description: Unique identifier denoting the associated action.

xdm:actionType.title: Action Type
xdm:actionType.description: The type of action to be performed.

meta:enum.scheduledNotification: This action type allows to specify scheduled notifications and wait for the notifications as incoming events for steps
meta:enum.httpCall: This action type is for a HTTP call on an external system
meta:enum.actionWithPersonalization: This action type describes an action with personalization that will be resolved at runtime for each voyager instance
meta:enum.parameterizedAction: This action type describes an action with parameterization
meta:enum.sendJourneyNotification: This action type is to send notification for another journey
meta:enum.acsWriter: The ACS writer action performs REST calls to an Adobe campaign standard instance to write data
meta:enum.acsMessageCenter: The ACS message center action performs REST calls to an Adobe campaign standard instance to send messages with Message Center

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: external event received
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: External event received, triggering the state transition

xdm:eventType.title: Type of the event received
xdm:eventType.description: The type for the external event received

meta:enum.http: The external event recieved on http endpoint

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Journey created by marketer for its users

xdm:journeyUID.title: Journey unique identifier
xdm:journeyUID.description: The unique identifier of the journey created by the marketer.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Journey version
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Schema for describing the version of a journey, where version holds the state machine

xdm:journeyVersionUID.title: Journey version identifier
xdm:journeyVersionUID.description: The unique identifier denoting the version of journey on which the user is active
